titleStmt.title: Charles D. Jacob to Beriah Magoffin
CWG8111

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Louisville August 30th 1861
Hon. B. Magoffin
Frankfort, Ky
Sir
I hereby respectfully tender to your my Excellency my resignation as Captain - attached to Second regiment Infantry K. S. G. - to take effect immediately-

With great respect, I am,
Your Excellency's Obedient Servant
Charles D,, Jacob
( of Martin & Co Louisville Ky)
Louisville Augst 30/ 61

your obd servt
A. L. Symmes
Maj. Comm'd 2 Regt Ky. State Guard

To His Excellency B. Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
Chas. D Jacob
Captain
Filed Sept. 2d 1861
